import React,{useContext, useState} from 'react' import userContext from '../Controllers/userContext' const OneOffer = () => { const userCon=useContext(userContext) const [infos,setInfos]=useState( { idCom:"5554684", title:"Full-Stack Dev", picture:"ibm.png", postDate:"4/6/2024", expireDate:"16/6/2024", field:"Technology", description:"Pour le compte de l'un de nos clients dans le secteur bancaire, nous recrutons des profils :‚úî Consultant DP\n - Activit√© de March√©‚úî Consultant DP - International (Cash management)‚úî Consultant DP - International (Conformit√©, Risque et Finance)‚úîConsultant DP - Infrastructure & Production Minimum 10 d'XPüìÜDate de d√©marrage : Imm√©diateüìç Poste bas√© √† Casablanca", position:"Permanent", time:"Full-Time", presence:"OnSite", numDemands:0, companyName:"IBM" } ) return (

{infos.companyName}

Posted : {infos.postDate}

{infos.title}

Field : {infos.field}

Presence : {infos.presence}

Position : {infos.position}

Full-time / Part-time : {infos.field}

Job Description

{infos.description}

Offer Ends on {infos.expireDate}

{ userCon.userType==="employer" && userCon.id=== }
) } export default OneOffer
